title: Want to see how much time you've spent on lol?

embed.description: Have you ever wondered how much time you spend on LoL ? An average player has spent 813 hours on League of Legends. 6.289.429 players took the test. And you ?

body: Have a look at the link and check how much you've wasted!

replies.body:
http://imgur.com/rhiFppD

wtf
23 hours
this is fake asf
sadly rito stopped them from counting normal game hours anymore, so thats only ranked hours.
To me ut says i wasted 118hours. And i've been playing for 4 years now. Like 6 games per day
2793 hours. but that's in game. if it included time spent being active in the client it'd be way higher.
